mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller (seller_id, password, name, email, phone_number, business_number, company_name) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{businessNumber}, #{companyName})
mapper.select: SELECT seller_id FROM seller WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId}
SELECT seller_no FROM seller WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId}

SELECT COUNT(*) from (select * FROM payments p where p.seller_id = #{sellerNo}) p JOIN delivery d ON p.payments_no = d.payments_no JOIN goods g ON d.inven_goods_no = g.GOODS_NO JOIN member m ON p.user_id = m.member_id
AND (g.GOODS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR m.member_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%'))
